title: Since featured game modes have become a thing, and in memory of URF which was in April.
body:
We are about to enter Season 5 and URF is not here yet; the majority of the players wish for it to be permanent.

Why not replace Dominion with URF ? Seriously Dominion game mode is much much less popular.

Reasons why:

1- Tryhards & 5s teams play Summoner's Rift because of the ranking system and relevance to LCS.

2- Casuals tend to play ARAM because they don't mind the meta and OP picks.

3- People with teams less than 5 & fans of bruiser metas play 3v3.

To me, Dominion's key feature is accelerated game play and less revolution around kills than the other modes.

However Dominion's reason of play is much less significant than the pure fun that URF provides.

We should have dominion BE the featured game mode instead of URF. {{summoner:31}}

There's no fun in "oh look, shaco spammed 6 boxes to guard him, then made 3 clones and splitpushed in an unstoppable onslaught. Oh look, Brand perma stunned me because he got a single EQ landed. Oh look, Soraka literally never dies, and no one near her does either. Oh look, Nidalee spams 1200+ range spears constantly while healing and jumping away". You know who had fun in urf? The first people who messed around, and then the people who played whichever bullshit could stay safe forever while nuking or perma stun you or ignore you. Urf Nasus was funny because he STILL had to stack his Q. It stacked faster, but he still had all the weaknesses of normal Nasus, just with speed injected. Urf Ezreal was not fun (for the other players) because his old weaknesses (low waveclear, mana costs, cooldowns for his escape) were all instantly removed to let him perma poke everything from absolute safety.
